clinics.title: Dressage for Jumpers
clinics.description: Show jumping riders learn to use dressage principles to improve balance, rhythm, and control.

clinics.title: Foundations of Dressage
clinics.subtitle: A comprehensive guide to the basics of dressage
clinics.description: Focus on rhythm, relaxation, connection, impulsion, straightness, and collection (the classical training scale).Ideal for new riders or those transitioning into dressage from other disciplines.

clinics.title: Josef Maier Clinic September 2023
clinics.subtitle: Josef Maier will be teaching at German Magic Farm on September 9th and 10th
clinics.description: If you are interested in this clinic please inquire below.

pageTagline: Learn, practice & have fun at a clinic!

seo.title: Riding jumping, eventing, cross country, and dressage clinics in Dundee, Mi
seo.description: Ride in a dressage or jumping clinic at German Magic Farm with professional riders and trainers from all over the world
